headline: Western Digital Authorizes New $2.0 Billion Share Repurchase Program
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., May 13, 2025--Western Digital Corp. (Nasdaq: WDC) today announced that its Board of Directors has authorized a new $2.0 billion share repurchase program. The repurchase authorization is effective immediately. Share repurchases may be made on the open market or in privately negotiated transactions and may be made pursuant to a Rule 10b5-1 plan.
